sentence.Network_en: Prospective buyers should study the small ads in the daily newspaper.
sentence.Network_cn: 打算购物的人应该研究研究日报上的小广告。

sentence.Network_en: A lot of money went on wining and dining prospective clients.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多钱都花在宴请潜在客户上了。

sentence.Network_en: A social worker is appointed to interview the prospective adopters.
sentence.Network_cn: 一名社工被任命对有意收养者进行面试。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'looking forward, having foresight'): from obsolete French prospectif, -ive or late Latin prospectivus, from Latin prospectus 'view' (see prospect)

entry.tran: 想要成为的；可能成为的
entry.def: You  use prospective to describe someone who wants to be the thing mentioned or who is likely to be the thing mentioned.

example.ex: The story should act as a warning to other prospective buyers...
example.tran: 这篇报道应该对其他潜在的购买者起到警示作用。

example.ex: When his prospective employers learned that he smoked, they said they wouldn't hire him.
example.tran: 本有可能雇用他的老板们得知他吸烟后，说他们不会雇他。

entry.def: You use prospective to describe something that is likely to happen soon.

example.tran: 可能达成的交易的条款

means.word_mean: 1. concerned with or related to the future;

sentences.sentence: "the statute is solely prospective in operation"

auth_sentence.content: I give different prospective on what established equations mean.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I give different prospective on what established equations mean.

auth_sentence.content: Many advisers offer prospective clients an initial free meeting.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many advisers offer prospective clients an initial free meeting.

auth_sentence.content: Prospective employers and insurance companies also use the number.
auth_sentence.res_content: Prospective employers and insurance companies also use the number.

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前+spect看+us→向前看的东西
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

means.word_mean: 预期的; 未来的; 可能的

sentences.cn: 她可能成为我们的顾客吗?

jushi.chinese: 她可能成为我们的顾客吗？
